function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of definite solution for treatment of COVID-19","Impact":"Continued spread of the virus and increased risk of infection","Mitigation":"Investment in medical research and development of effective treatments and vaccines","Technologies":"Medical research, pharmaceutical development","People":"Public, healthcare workers, researchers","Owner":"Medical and pharmaceutical industries"},{"Description":"Ineffective control of virus spread in public places","Impact":"Higher risk of transmission and infection in public settings","Mitigation":"Implementation of AI, computer vision, and technology solutions for monitoring and control","Technologies":"AI, computer vision, technology solutions","People":"Public, policymakers, technology developers","Owner":"Technology companies, government agencies"},{"Description":"Challenges in determining and predicting the number of infected and recovered individuals","Impact":"Difficulty in implementing targeted interventions and control measures","Mitigation":"Development of modified epidemiological models with social distancing parameters","Technologies":"Epidemiological modelling, data analysis, social distancing technology","People":"Public health authorities, researchers, policymakers","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"}]}
